scripts:
# Create group & Set Permission to ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentAuthors_PRD group
 create group ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentAuthors_PRD
 set ACL for ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentAuthors_PRD
 allow jcr:read on /var/workflow/models
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/scheduled_tree_activation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/scheduled_activation_with_references/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam-xmp-writeback/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dam_set_last_modified/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/translate-i18n-dictionary/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/scheduled_unpublish_bp/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/scheduled_publish_bp/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/projects/request_launch/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/projects/request_copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/projects/approval_workflow/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/adddamsize/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/adddamsize/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/prepare_translation_project/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/asset_processing_on_sdk/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/InboxRequest/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/reverse_replication/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/cloud_post_processing/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/cloudconfigs/dtm-reactor/library-download/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/reverse_replication/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dynamic-media-reupload/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/smart-tags-guided-training/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dynamic-media-reprocess/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dam-autotag-assets/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/email-download-artifacts/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dynamic-media-reupload-local/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/sync_language_copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/s7dam/request_to_remove_from_youtube/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/s7dam/request_to_publish_to_youtube/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/launch-review/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dam-create-and-translate-language-copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dam-create-language-copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/dam-update-language-copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/request_to_complete_move_operation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/ac-newsletter-workflow-simple/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/request_for_deletion/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/request_for_deletion_without_deactivation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/update_language_copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/projects/request_landing_page/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/projects/request_email/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/publish_to_campaign/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/translate-language-copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/dam/batch-thumbnails/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/create_language_copy/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/prepare_translation_project/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/wcm-translation/sync_translation_job/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/cloudservices/DTM_bundle_download/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/scheduled_activation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/request_for_deactivation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/request_for_activation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/scheduled_deactivation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/translation/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/publish_example/)
 deny jcr:read on /var/workflow/models restriction(rep:glob,/newsletter_bounce_check/)
 allow jcr:read on /
 deny crx:replicate on /content
 allow jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /content
 allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /etc
 allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /var
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/showcase
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/blueprint
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/suzuki
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/power-alliance
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/mazda
 deny jcr:all on /etc/workflow/models
 end

# Create group & Set Permission to ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentApprovers_PRD group
 create group ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentApprovers_PRD
 set ACL for ga_AEM_SSCP_TFA_ContentApprovers_PRD
 allow jcr:read on /
 deny crx:replicate on /conf
 allow jcr:read, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement,jcr:versionManagement on /var
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/showcase
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/blueprint
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/suzuki
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/power-alliance
 deny jcr:all on /content/sscp/mazda

 end

# Create group & Set Permissions to ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_LegalApprovers_PRD group

 set ACL for ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_LegalApprovers_PRD
 allow jcr:read on /
 deny crx:replicate on /conf
 allow jcr:read, jcr:versionManagement, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /var

# Create group & Set Permissions to ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_Admin_PRD group
 create group ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_Admin_PRD
 set ACL for ga_AEM_SSCP_Global_Admin_PRD
 allow jcr:all on /content/dam/sscp
 allow jcr:all on /
 allow jcr:all on /content/sscp
 allow jcr:all on /etc
 allow jcr:all on /var
 allow jcr:all on /conf
 end

# Create Service User
 create service user toyotaWorkflowUser
 set ACL on /libs,/content,/conf,/etc
 allow jcr:all for toyotaWorkflowUser
 end
